org.jwebsocket.plugins.jmx

Class JMXPlugInFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jwebsocket.plugins.jmx.JMXPlugInFunctions

  • public class JMXPlugInFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to invoke certain features of the plugins that are running on a given server. It also provides information about the plugins that are loaded and the functionalities that can be invoked.
    Author:
    Lisdey Pérez Hernández(lisdey89, UCI)
